creator: curtis.paris@metro1.com
curtis.paris@metro1.com
text:
In my simplest example, I mis-entered the Regexp.  It should read:

   Regexp: \b(eek.*)

Without the astrick, it wouldn't match (since there is nothing after the k.  
The quotes were there to represent that it was a string, not part of the data 
itself).

creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
text:
Tried with 1.3-dev, with following in RETest.txt:

#1
\b(eek.*)
week
NO


It had not matched "week". Seems that this bug was fixed. Please try 1.3-dev for
yourself, and reopen bug if it still does not work for you.
